FuncDef: This command configures the node to receive multicast NTP messages on the CPM MGMT port. Ifmulticastclientis not configured, received NTP multicast traffic will be ignored. Use theshowcommand to view the state of the configuration.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to make authentication a requirement (optional). If authentication is required, the authentication key-id received must have been configured in the authentication-key command, and that key-id type and key value must also match.
